summary: App with Cases feature stored in a backend canister. Cases are not loading (blank list) on both the Dashboard and Cases pages after a UI-related update in version 95, while version 93 worked fine. No error messages shown.
architectural_notes: Cases data is stored in a backend canister and displayed on both Dashboard and Cases pages.
known_issues: Cases show as blank list on Dashboard and Cases pages after v95 UI update; worked in v93. No error messages. Likely a prop/query wiring issue from the UI refactor.

existing_features.title: Restore Cases data rendering on the Dashboard page so that surgery cases fetched from the backend canister display correctly, matching the behavior from version 93. The fix must ensure the React Query hook result is properly wired to the component's rendering logic without altering any backend calls.

Restore Cases data rendering on the Cases list page (CasesListView) so that surgery cases fetched from the backend canister display correctly, matching the behavior from version 93. Inspect and repair any broken prop passing, query result destructuring, or data mapping introduced by the UI refactor between v93 and v95 (specifically changes related to WorkflowIcon.tsx, CaseCard.tsx, ChecklistEditor.tsx, and useQueries.ts).
